mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, T.* FROM ( SELECT CMID, USERID, PROJECTID, CONTENT AS content, NVL(RATING, 0) AS rating, CREATEDAT, CODE FROM COMMUNITY WHERE PROJECTID = 222 AND TRIM(CODE) = 'CM' ORDER BY CREATEDAT ) T ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{pager.page} - 1) * #{pager.size} + 1 AND (#{pager.page} * #{pager.size}) ORDER BY rnum DESC
